meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points of equal value.
meanings.sent1: The isolines on the map show where the temperature is the same.
meanings.sent2: I used isolines to find where the elevation is constant on the map.
meanings.sent3: The isolines on the map looked like a colorful spider web.
meanings.sent4: The isolines on the map were like threads weaving through the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The isolines on the map made it easy to see where the river flows.

meanings.definition: A line on a graph representing a constant value.
meanings.sent1: The isolines on the graph indicate where the function stays the same.
meanings.sent2: We plotted isolines to show where the pressure remains constant.
meanings.sent3: The isolines on the graph seemed to dance as the values stayed equal.
meanings.sent4: The isolines on the graph acted like a fence, keeping the values in check.
meanings.sent5: The isolines on the graph painted a clear picture of the data trend.
